to-consider: to use web-dev-server  and nodemon at the same time, you must add app.use(cors()) in the backend, { mode: 'cors'} in the frontend wheb you fetch, and crossorigin=anonymous in the html script tag. also, const SERVER_URL = 'http://localhost:3000' has to be set as the server api to request json
mysql.createPool in the models/mysql module must be changed to satisfy the development needs
app.listen(3000) must be set to develop locally
